Finding posted serial codes doesn't work often because Ambrosia foiled that by making registration codes time-senditive. They expire a month after they are issued, and you have to submit the last code you got to renew it if it expires. If a code gets posted where they can find it, they permanently expire it so the system won't renew it. That's why you have to find a keygen or a crack.
